__e: She is a sagacious woman. Not to mention full of courage.
We better be good and sensible and wait, even if it takes years.
Actually, it'll be faster if we misbehave.
I think those are wise words.
Thank you for those sage words, Confucius, but I have been doing the work every day, all day, for the past 12 weeks.
I'm just not gonna talk for a while, no matter how much I think you may need to hear my fabulous words of wisdom.
